#Text=NM
#Text=: Opening Skinners Box : Great Psychological Experiments of the Twentieth Century by Lauren Slater
#Text=The Lucifer Effect : How Good People Turn Evil
#Text=by Phil Zimbardo
#Text=Mistakes Were Made ( But Not by Me )
#Text=by Carol Tavris
#Text=( (
#Text=WN
#Text=) )
#Text=It is understandable that the act of writing down your experiences on paper could be a cathartic process but - why publicize it as a book ?
#Text=NM
#Text=:

#Text=As I write in my Preface the book was written almost two years ago , but the fear of publishing books on the subject of Scientology , got it no where in the area of publishing , Scientology is too frightening and scares even large publishing houses .
#Text=I even got turned away by a " Print on Demand " – where I pay for it myself .

column1: #Text=They were just to frightened of repercussions on them as a company and on the staff as individuals .
#Text=But one night , an old friend who had been in Scientology for 36 years and had reached the highest most level in Scientology ( Operating Thetan Level 8 ) arrived at my door suicidal .
#Text=I knew I had to do more .

#Text=For the past 10 years I had been dealing with Mentally Troubled individuals one on one , but this woman brought to my door the fact that what I was doing was n’t even cracking the egg of mental abuse .
#Text=So I took my book off the shelf and my husband and I started our own publishing company .
#Text=( (
#Text=WN
#Text=) )
#Text=Did you fear publicizing your experiences could subject you and your family to the Scientology practice of " Fair Game " ?
#Text=NM
#Text=: Of course .
#Text=In my particular case they had already interrogated me to the point of psychotic meltdown , and there was n't much more they could do to me .
#Text=I hear the clicks on my phone , I ’ve gotten the private investigator with the CIA past placed on my car .
#Text=I ’ve had people show up .
#Text=But as long as I am truthful and do n't make things worse than they were , nor better than they were , this is America , land of Free Speech .

#Text=While working to get the book out ( in those two months ) I came to learn of 3 more deaths of people who experienced mental breakdowns while under the care of Scientologist , it only spurred me on .
#Text=( (
#Text=WN
#Text=) )
#Text=Have you experienced anything from Scientology after publicizing your story that you feel is retribution or a form of Fair Game ?
#Text=NM
#Text=: I 'm never certain if it is coincidence or not , but yes little things , not like the others that are coming out now and testifying at court cases .
#Text=I also think Scientology is a little busy with just being declared a Fraud by the Government of France , Belgium has been preparing their law suit and should be coming out shortly .
#Text=Here in America , the current head of Scientology and the corporation have just been served with a lawsuit on human trafficking .
#Text=An eight year old boy was signed up with the Sea Org ( Billion Year Contract ) and he was put to work scrubbing pots and pans from that young age .

#Text=I know of under aged children who signed Billion Year Contracts , they were promised their High School educations , which they never got , but those children were 13 or 14 – this is an 8 year old boy .
#Text=Senator Xenophon in Australia has just stood up and asked for a government inquiry to the human abuses of Scientology .
#Text=His documentation includes part of my book .
#Text=Yes there are many things they can do to me , but I am tired of them Mentally and otherwise abusing people to the point of suicide .
